[[File:Christinasearstour.jpg|thumb|right|150px|[[Christina Aguilera]] peaked at number three in February with "[[What a Girl Wants (song)|What a Girl Wants]]".]]
 
[[File:Craig-David 2008.jpg|thumb|right|150px|"[[Fill Me In]]" was the first of two number-one singles that year for Craig David, in March. "[[7 Days (Craig David song)|7 Days]] repeated the success in July.]]
